title: Keeping Up with Coronavirus - Ex-Presidents Push Vaccination | Rebecca Carroll & Precious Lee
itunes:title: Keeping Up with Coronavirus - Ex-Presidents Push Vaccination | Rebecca Carroll & Precious Lee
description:
Former presidents try to convince Americans to get COVID-19 vaccinations, Rebecca Carroll discusses "Surviving the White Gaze," and Precious Lee talks about her trailblazing modeling career.


In honor of Women's History Month, help level the playing field for girls of color in STEM by donating at dailyshow.com/BlackGirlsCode.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
